choose.when: select * from(select rownum rank, h.hashtag hashtag, h.cnt cnt from (select hashtag, count(*) cnt from hashtag where logTime < sysdate - 7 group by hashtag order by count(*) desc) h) hh where hh.rank > 11

select * from(select rownum rank, h.hashtag hashtag, h.cnt cnt from (select hashtag, count(*) cnt from hashtag where logTime < sysdate - 30 group by hashtag order by count(*) desc) h) hh where hh.rank > 11
choose.otherwise: select * from(select rownum rank, h.hashtag hashtag, h.cnt cnt, to_char((sysdate-(select case when (mod(to_number((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy'))), 4) = 0 and mod(to_number((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy'))), 100) <> 0) then 366 else 365 end from dual) ), 'yyyy.mm.dd') fromdate, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') today from (select hashtag, count(*) cnt from hashtag where logTime < sysdate - (select case when (mod(to_number((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy'))), 4) = 0 and mod(to_number((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy'))), 100) <> 0) then 366 else 365 end from dual) group by hashtag order by count(*) desc) h) hh where hh.rank > 11
